dn34:1.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā campāyaṁ viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
dn34:1.1.3_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
dn34:1.1.5_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
dn34:1.2.32_0: Iti ime dasa dhammā bhūtā tacchā tathā avitathā anaññathā sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
dn34:1.3.21_0: Yo ca hetu yo ca paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya, yo ca hetu yo ca paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā.
dn34:1.3.29_0: saṅkhatā ca dhātu asaṅkhatā ca dhātu.
dn34:1.3.34_0: Iti ime vīsati dhammā bhūtā tacchā tathā avitathā anaññathā sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
dn34:1.4.1_0: Tayo dhammā bahukārā, tayo dhammā bhāvetabbā …pe… tayo dhammā sacchikātabbā.
dn34:1.4.7_0: savitakko savicāro samādhi, avitakko vicāramatto samādhi, avitakko avicāro samādhi.
dn34:1.4.11_0: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
dn34:1.4.19_0: lobho akusalamūlaṁ, doso akusalamūlaṁ, moho akusalamūlaṁ.
dn34:1.4.23_0: alobho kusalamūlaṁ, adoso kusalamūlaṁ, amoho kusalamūlaṁ.
dn34:1.4.27_2: yaṁ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ,
dn34:1.4.31_0: atītaṁse ñāṇaṁ, anāgataṁse ñāṇaṁ, paccuppannaṁse ñāṇaṁ.
dn34:1.4.39_0: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ vijjā, sattānaṁ cutūpapāte ñāṇaṁ vijjā, āsavānaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ vijjā.
dn34:1.4.41_0: Iti ime tiṁsa dhammā bhūtā tacchā tathā avitathā anaññathā sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
dn34:1.5.1_0: Cattāro dhammā bahukārā, cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā …pe… cattāro dhammā sacchikātabbā.
dn34:1.5.4_0: patirūpadesavāso, sappurisūpanissayo, attasammāpaṇidhi, pubbe ca katapuññatā.
dn34:1.5.8_0: idhāvuso, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
dn34:1.5.11_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
dn34:1.5.15_0: kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṁ catutthaṁ.
dn34:1.5.31_0: hānabhāgiyo samādhi, ṭhitibhāgiyo samādhi, visesabhāgiyo samādhi, nibbedhabhāgiyo samādhi.
dn34:1.5.35_0: dhamme ñāṇaṁ, anvaye ñāṇaṁ, pariye ñāṇaṁ, sammutiyā ñāṇaṁ.
dn34:1.5.45_0: Iti ime cattārīsadhammā bhūtā tacchā tathā avitathā anaññathā sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
dn34:1.6.1_0: Pañca dhammā bahukārā …pe… pañca dhammā sacchikātabbā.
dn34:1.6.4_0: idhāvuso, bhikkhu saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
dn34:1.6.5_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
dn34:1.6.6_0: Appābādho hoti appātaṅko samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya.
dn34:1.6.7_0: Asaṭho hoti amāyāvī yathābhūtamattānaṁ āvīkattā satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu.
dn34:1.6.9_0: Paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
dn34:1.6.25_0: idhāvuso, bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati.
dn34:1.6.26_1: bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati,
dn34:1.6.26_2: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
dn34:1.6.27_0: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
dn34:1.6.29_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu dhamme kaṅkhati vicikicchati …pe…
dn34:1.6.32_0: sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto, yo so, āvuso,
dn34:1.6.32_1: bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto,
dn34:1.6.32_2: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
dn34:1.6.33_0: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
dn34:1.6.42_1: bhikkhuno kāme manasikaroto kāmesu cittaṁ na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
dn34:1.6.43_0: Nekkhammaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto nekkhamme cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
dn34:1.6.44_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ visaṁyuttaṁ kāmehi.
dn34:1.6.45_0: Ye ca kāmapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātā pariḷāhā, mutto so tehi. Na so taṁ vedanaṁ vedeti.
dn34:1.6.47_1: bhikkhuno byāpādaṁ manasikaroto byāpāde cittaṁ na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
dn34:1.6.48_0: Abyāpādaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto abyāpāde cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
dn34:1.6.49_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ visaṁyuttaṁ byāpādena.
dn34:1.6.50_0: Ye ca byāpādapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātā pariḷāhā, mutto so tehi. Na so taṁ vedanaṁ vedeti.
dn34:1.6.52_1: bhikkhuno vihesaṁ manasikaroto vihesāya cittaṁ na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
dn34:1.6.53_0: Avihesaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto avihesāya cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
dn34:1.6.54_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ visaṁyuttaṁ vihesāya.
dn34:1.6.55_0: Ye ca vihesāpaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātā pariḷāhā, mutto so tehi. Na so taṁ vedanaṁ vedeti.
dn34:1.6.57_1: bhikkhuno rūpe manasikaroto rūpesu cittaṁ na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
dn34:1.6.58_0: Arūpaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto arūpe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
dn34:1.6.59_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ visaṁyuttaṁ rūpehi.
dn34:1.6.60_0: Ye ca rūpapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātā pariḷāhā, mutto so tehi. Na so taṁ vedanaṁ vedeti.
dn34:1.6.62_1: bhikkhuno sakkāyaṁ manasikaroto sakkāye cittaṁ na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
dn34:1.6.63_0: Sakkāyanirodhaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
dn34:1.6.64_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ visaṁyuttaṁ sakkāyena.
dn34:1.6.65_0: Ye ca sakkāyapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātā pariḷāhā, mutto so tehi. Na so taṁ vedanaṁ vedeti.
dn34:1.6.70_0: ‘ayaṁ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko’ti paccattaṁyeva ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
dn34:1.6.71_0: ‘Ayaṁ samādhi ariyo nirāmiso’ti paccattaññeva ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
dn34:1.6.74_0: ‘So kho panāhaṁ imaṁ samādhiṁ satova samāpajjāmi sato vuṭṭhahāmī’ti paccattaṁyeva ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
dn34:1.6.78_0: idhāvuso, bhikkhuno satthā dhammaṁ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī.
dn34:1.6.79_2: aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī tathā tathā so tasmiṁ dhamme atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṁvedī ca.
dn34:1.6.82_1: bhikkhuno na heva kho satthā dhammaṁ deseti,
dn34:1.6.82_3: api ca kho yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti
dn34:1.6.83_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti tathā tathā so tasmiṁ dhamme atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṁvedī ca.
dn34:1.6.86_1: bhikkhuno na heva kho satthā dhammaṁ deseti,
dn34:1.6.86_3: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti.
dn34:1.6.86_4: Api ca kho yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti.
dn34:1.6.87_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti tathā tathā so tasmiṁ dhamme atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṁvedī ca.
dn34:1.6.90_1: bhikkhuno na heva kho satthā dhammaṁ deseti,
dn34:1.6.90_3: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti,
dn34:1.6.90_4: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti.
dn34:1.6.91_0: Api ca kho yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
dn34:1.6.92_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati tathā tathā
dn34:1.6.92_2: so tasmiṁ dhamme atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṁvedī ca.
dn34:1.6.95_1: bhikkhuno na heva kho satthā dhammaṁ deseti,
dn34:1.6.95_3: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti,
dn34:1.6.95_4: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti,
dn34:1.6.95_5: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati;
dn34:1.6.96_0: api ca khvassa aññataraṁ samādhinimittaṁ suggahitaṁ hoti sumanasikataṁ sūpadhāritaṁ suppaṭividdhaṁ paññāya.
dn34:1.6.97_1: bhikkhuno aññataraṁ samādhinimittaṁ suggahitaṁ hoti sumanasikataṁ sūpadhāritaṁ suppaṭividdhaṁ paññāya
dn34:1.6.97_2: tathā tathā so tasmiṁ dhamme atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṁvedī ca.
dn34:1.6.105_0: Iti ime paññāsa dhammā bhūtā tacchā tathā avitathā anaññathā sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
dn34:1.7.1_0: Cha dhammā bahukārā …pe… cha dhammā sacchikātabbā.
dn34:1.7.4_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhuno mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca,
dn34:1.7.5_0: ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
dn34:1.7.6_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhuno mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ …pe… ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
dn34:1.7.7_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhuno mettaṁ manokammaṁ …pe… ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
dn34:1.7.8_1: bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampi,
dn34:1.7.8_2: tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhattabhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogī,
dn34:1.7.9_1: yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṁvattanikāni,
dn34:1.7.9_2: tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca,
dn34:1.7.10_1: bhikkhu yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
dn34:1.7.10_2: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhi sāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca,
dn34:1.7.11_0: ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo, saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
dn34:1.7.15_0: buddhānussati, dhammānussati, saṅghānussati, sīlānussati, cāgānussati, devatānussati.
dn34:1.7.19_0: cakkhāyatanaṁ, sotāyatanaṁ, ghānāyatanaṁ, jivhāyatanaṁ, kāyāyatanaṁ, manāyatanaṁ.
dn34:1.7.23_0: rūpataṇhā, saddataṇhā, gandhataṇhā, rasataṇhā, phoṭṭhabbataṇhā, dhammataṇhā.
dn34:1.7.36_1: cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā,
dn34:1.7.37_0: atha ca pana me byāpādo cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
dn34:1.7.39_0: Aṭṭhānametaṁ āvuso anavakāso yaṁ mettāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya.
dn34:1.7.40_0: Atha ca panassa byāpādo cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatīti, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
dn34:1.7.41_0: Nissaraṇaṁ hetaṁ, āvuso, byāpādassa, yadidaṁ mettācetovimuttī’ti.
dn34:1.7.43_0: ‘karuṇā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā.
dn34:1.7.44_0: Atha ca pana me vihesā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
dn34:1.7.45_0: So: ‘mā hevan’tissa vacanīyo, ‘māyasmā evaṁ avaca, mā bhagavantaṁ abbhācikkhi …pe…
dn34:1.7.46_0: nissaraṇaṁ hetaṁ, āvuso, vihesāya, yadidaṁ karuṇācetovimuttī’ti.
dn34:1.7.49_0: atha ca pana me arati cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
dn34:1.7.51_0: nissaraṇaṁ hetaṁ, āvuso, aratiyā, yadidaṁ muditācetovimuttī’ti.
dn34:1.7.54_0: atha ca pana me rāgo cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
dn34:1.7.56_0: nissaraṇaṁ hetaṁ, āvuso, rāgassa yadidaṁ upekkhācetovimuttī’ti.
dn34:1.7.59_0: atha ca pana me nimittānusāri viññāṇaṁ hotī’ti.
dn34:1.7.61_0: nissaraṇaṁ hetaṁ, āvuso, sabbanimittānaṁ yadidaṁ animittā cetovimuttī’ti.
dn34:1.7.63_0: ‘asmīti kho me vigataṁ, ayamahamasmīti na samanupassāmi,
dn34:1.7.64_0: atha ca pana me vicikicchākathaṅkathāsallaṁ cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
dn34:1.7.66_0: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṁ asmīti vigate ayamahamasmīti asamanupassato.
dn34:1.7.67_0: Atha ca panassa vicikicchākathaṅkathāsallaṁ cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
dn34:1.7.68_0: Nissaraṇaṁ hetaṁ, āvuso, vicikicchākathaṅkathāsallassa, yadidaṁ asmimānasamugghāto’ti.
dn34:1.7.72_1: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano,
dn34:1.7.77_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
dn34:1.7.85_1: bhikkhu anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
dn34:1.7.85_4: tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāse;
dn34:1.7.85_7: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
dn34:1.7.85_8: imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjati;
dn34:1.7.86_0: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāti dibbe ca mānuse ca,
dn34:1.7.87_0: Parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti,
dn34:1.7.88_0: sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ sarāgaṁ cittanti pajānāti …pe…
dn34:1.7.89_0: avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ avimuttaṁ cittanti pajānāti.
dn34:1.7.90_2: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
dn34:1.7.91_0: Dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe
dn34:1.7.91_1: dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti …pe…
dn34:1.7.92_0: Āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
dn34:1.7.94_0: Iti ime saṭṭhi dhammā bhūtā tacchā tathā avitathā anaññathā sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
dn34:1.8.1_0: Satta dhammā bahukārā …pe… satta dhammā sacchikātabbā.
dn34:1.8.4_0: saddhādhanaṁ, sīladhanaṁ, hiridhanaṁ, ottappadhanaṁ, sutadhanaṁ, cāgadhanaṁ, paññādhanaṁ.
dn34:1.8.12_0: santāvuso, sattā nānattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā.
dn34:1.8.14_0: Santāvuso, sattā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā brahmakāyikā paṭhamābhinibbattā.
dn34:1.8.16_0: Santāvuso, sattā ekattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā ābhassarā.
dn34:1.8.18_0: Santāvuso, sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhā.
dn34:1.8.20_0: Santāvuso, sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā …pe… ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā.
dn34:1.8.22_0: Santāvuso, sattā sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā.
dn34:1.8.24_0: Santāvuso, sattā sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā.
dn34:1.8.41_1: bhikkhu dhammaññū ca hoti atthaññū ca attaññū ca mattaññū ca kālaññū ca parisaññū ca puggalaññū ca.
dn34:1.8.45_0: aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, asubhasaññā, ādīnavasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā.
dn34:1.8.49_0: idhāvuso, bhikkhu sikkhāsamādāne tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca sikkhāsamādāne avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.50_0: Dhammanisantiyā tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca dhammanisantiyā avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.51_0: Icchāvinaye tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca icchāvinaye avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.52_0: Paṭisallāne tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca paṭisallāne avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.53_0: Vīriyārambhe tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca vīriyārambhe avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.54_0: Satinepakke tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca satinepakke avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.55_0: Diṭṭhipaṭivedhe tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca diṭṭhipaṭivedhe avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.59_0: idhāvuso, khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe saṅkhārā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
dn34:1.8.60_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe saṅkhārā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti,
dn34:1.8.60_3: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti:
dn34:1.8.61_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
dn34:1.8.63_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṁ cittaṁ hoti vivekapoṇaṁ vivekapabbhāraṁ vivekaṭṭhaṁ nekkhammābhirataṁ
dn34:1.8.65_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā.
dn34:1.8.67_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni honti subhāvitāni.
dn34:1.8.69_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā.
dn34:1.8.71_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito.
dn34:1.8.72_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito,
dn34:1.8.72_3: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti:
dn34:1.8.75_0: Itime sattati dhammā bhūtā tacchā tathā avitathā anaññathā sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
dn34:2.1.1_0: Aṭṭha dhammā bahukārā …pe… aṭṭha dhammā sacchikātabbā.
dn34:2.1.3_0: Aṭṭha hetū aṭṭha paccayā ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattanti.
dn34:2.1.5_1: bhikkhu satthāraṁ upanissāya viharati aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ,
dn34:2.1.5_2: yatthassa tibbaṁ hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti pemañca gāravo ca.
dn34:2.1.6_0: Ayaṁ paṭhamo hetu paṭhamo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
dn34:2.1.6_1: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
dn34:2.1.7_0: Taṁ kho pana satthāraṁ upanissāya viharati aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ,
dn34:2.1.7_1: yatthassa tibbaṁ hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti pemañca gāravo ca.
dn34:2.1.7_2: Te kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati:
dn34:2.1.10_2: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ paṭivinodenti.
dn34:2.1.11_0: Ayaṁ dutiyo hetu dutiyo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
dn34:2.1.12_0: Taṁ kho pana dhammaṁ sutvā dvayena vūpakāsena sampādeti—kāyavūpakāsena ca cittavūpakāsena ca.
dn34:2.1.13_0: Ayaṁ tatiyo hetu tatiyo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
dn34:2.1.13_1: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
dn34:2.1.14_3: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
dn34:2.1.15_0: Ayaṁ catuttho hetu catuttho paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
dn34:2.1.15_1: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
dn34:2.1.16_2: Ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthā sabyañjanā kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
dn34:2.1.16_3: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
dn34:2.1.17_0: Ayaṁ pañcamo hetu pañcamo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
dn34:2.1.17_1: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
dn34:2.1.18_1: bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya,
dn34:2.1.19_0: Ayaṁ chaṭṭho hetu chaṭṭho paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
dn34:2.1.19_1: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
dn34:2.1.20_1: bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato.
dn34:2.1.21_0: Ayaṁ sattamo hetu sattamo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
dn34:2.1.21_1: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
dn34:2.1.22_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu, udayabbayānupassī viharati:
dn34:2.1.23_0: ‘iti rūpaṁ iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
dn34:2.1.24_0: iti vedanā iti vedanāya samudayo iti vedanāya atthaṅgamo;
dn34:2.1.25_0: iti saññā iti saññāya samudayo iti saññāya atthaṅgamo;
dn34:2.1.26_0: iti saṅkhārā iti saṅkhārānaṁ samudayo iti saṅkhārānaṁ atthaṅgamo;
dn34:2.1.27_0: iti viññāṇaṁ iti viññāṇassa samudayo iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
dn34:2.1.28_0: Ayaṁ aṭṭhamo hetu aṭṭhamo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
dn34:2.1.28_1: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
dn34:2.1.36_0: lābho ca, alābho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, nindā ca, pasaṁsā ca, sukhañca, dukkhañca.
dn34:2.1.46_1: kammaṁ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilamissati,
dn34:2.1.47_1: na vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
dn34:2.1.49_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhunā kammaṁ kataṁ hoti.
dn34:2.1.51_0: ‘ahaṁ kho kammaṁ akāsiṁ, kammaṁ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilanto, handāhaṁ nipajjāmī’ti.
dn34:2.1.54_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhunā maggo gantabbo hoti.
dn34:2.1.56_1: maggaṁ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilamissati,
dn34:2.1.59_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhunā maggo gato hoti.
dn34:2.1.61_0: ‘ahaṁ kho maggaṁ agamāsiṁ, maggaṁ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilanto, handāhaṁ nipajjāmī’ti.
dn34:2.1.64_1: bhikkhu gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto na labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
dn34:2.1.66_0: ‘ahaṁ kho gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṁ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ,
dn34:2.1.68_1: bhikkhu gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
dn34:2.1.70_0: ‘ahaṁ kho gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṁ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ,
dn34:2.1.73_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhuno uppanno hoti appamattako ābādho, tassa evaṁ hoti:
dn34:2.1.74_0: ‘uppanno kho me ayaṁ appamattako ābādho atthi kappo nipajjituṁ, handāhaṁ nipajjāmī’ti.
dn34:2.1.77_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu gilānāvuṭṭhito hoti aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā.
dn34:2.1.80_0: Tassa me kāyo dubbalo akammañño, handāhaṁ nipajjāmī’ti.
dn34:2.1.86_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhunā kammaṁ kātabbaṁ hoti, tassa evaṁ hoti:
dn34:2.1.87_1: kammaṁ kho pana me karontena na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasikātuṁ,
dn34:2.1.87_2: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
dn34:2.1.88_0: So vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
dn34:2.1.90_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhunā kammaṁ kataṁ hoti.
dn34:2.1.92_1: kammaṁ kho panāhaṁ karonto nāsakkhiṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasikātuṁ,
dn34:2.1.94_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhunā maggo gantabbo hoti.
dn34:2.1.96_1: maggaṁ kho pana me gacchantena na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasikātuṁ,
dn34:2.1.98_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhunā maggo gato hoti.
dn34:2.1.100_1: maggaṁ kho panāhaṁ gacchanto nāsakkhiṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasikātuṁ,
dn34:2.1.102_1: bhikkhu gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto na labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
dn34:2.1.104_0: ‘ahaṁ kho gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṁ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ,
dn34:2.1.106_1: bhikkhu gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
dn34:2.1.108_0: ‘ahaṁ kho gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṁ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
dn34:2.1.109_0: Tassa me kāyo balavā kammañño, handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi …pe…
dn34:2.1.111_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhuno uppanno hoti appamattako ābādho.
dn34:2.1.113_0: ‘uppanno kho me ayaṁ appamattako ābādho ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ vijjati,
dn34:2.1.115_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu gilānā vuṭṭhito hoti aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā.
dn34:2.1.117_3: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
dn34:2.1.118_0: So vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
dn34:2.1.123_1: tathāgato ca loke uppanno hoti arahaṁ sammāsambuddho,
dn34:2.1.123_2: dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito.
dn34:2.1.126_1: tathāgato ca loke uppanno hoti arahaṁ sammāsambuddho,
dn34:2.1.126_2: dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito.
dn34:2.1.136_0: paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti milakkhesu aviññātāresu,
dn34:2.1.136_1: yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ upāsakānaṁ upāsikānaṁ.
dn34:2.1.139_0: ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti, so ca hoti micchādiṭṭhiko viparītadassano:
dn34:2.1.140_9: natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṁ parañca lokaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti.
dn34:2.1.143_0: ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti,
dn34:2.1.143_1: so ca hoti duppañño jaḷo eḷamūgo,
dn34:2.1.146_0: ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti,
dn34:2.1.146_1: so ca hoti paññavā ajaḷo aneḷamūgo,
dn34:2.1.157_0: Paññavato ayaṁ dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo duppaññassa.
dn34:2.1.158_0: Nippapañcassāyaṁ dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo papañcārāmassāti ime aṭṭha dhammā uppādetabbā.
dn34:2.1.161_0: ajjhattaṁ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
dn34:2.1.164_0: Ajjhattaṁ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
dn34:2.1.167_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
dn34:2.1.170_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
dn34:2.1.173_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni.
dn34:2.1.174_0: Seyyathāpi nāma umāpupphaṁ nīlaṁ nīlavaṇṇaṁ nīlanidassanaṁ nīlanibhāsaṁ,
dn34:2.1.174_1: seyyathā vā pana taṁ vatthaṁ bārāṇaseyyakaṁ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṁ nīlaṁ nīlavaṇṇaṁ nīlanidassanaṁ nīlanibhāsaṁ;
dn34:2.1.175_0: evameva ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni,
dn34:2.1.177_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni pītanibhāsāni.
dn34:2.1.178_0: Seyyathāpi nāma kaṇikārapupphaṁ pītaṁ pītavaṇṇaṁ pītanidassanaṁ pītanibhāsaṁ,
dn34:2.1.178_1: seyyathā vā pana taṁ vatthaṁ bārāṇaseyyakaṁ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṁ pītaṁ pītavaṇṇaṁ pītanidassanaṁ pītanibhāsaṁ;
dn34:2.1.179_0: evameva ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni pītanibhāsāni,
dn34:2.1.181_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati lohitakāni lohitakavaṇṇāni lohitakanidassanāni lohitakanibhāsāni.
dn34:2.1.182_0: Seyyathāpi nāma bandhujīvakapupphaṁ lohitakaṁ lohitakavaṇṇaṁ lohitakanidassanaṁ lohitakanibhāsaṁ,
dn34:2.1.182_1: seyyathā vā pana taṁ vatthaṁ bārāṇaseyyakaṁ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṁ lohitakaṁ lohitakavaṇṇaṁ lohitakanidassanaṁ lohitakanibhāsaṁ;
dn34:2.1.183_0: evameva ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati lohitakāni lohitakavaṇṇāni lohitakanidassanāni lohitakanibhāsāni,
dn34:2.1.185_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni.
dn34:2.1.186_0: Seyyathāpi nāma osadhitārakā odātā odātavaṇṇā odātanidassanā odātanibhāsā,
dn34:2.1.186_1: seyyathā vā pana taṁ vatthaṁ bārāṇaseyyakaṁ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṁ odātaṁ odātavaṇṇaṁ odātanidassanaṁ odātanibhāsaṁ;
dn34:2.1.187_0: evameva ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni,
dn34:2.1.194_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati.
dn34:2.1.198_0: Sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.1.200_0: Sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.1.202_0: Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.1.204_0: Sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.1.206_0: Sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.1.209_0: Iti ime asīti dhammā bhūtā tacchā tathā avitathā anaññathā sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
dn34:2.2.1_0: Nava dhammā bahukārā …pe… nava dhammā sacchikātabbā.
dn34:2.2.11_0: santāvuso, sattā nānattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā.
dn34:2.2.13_0: Santāvuso, sattā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā brahmakāyikā paṭhamābhinibbattā.
dn34:2.2.15_0: Santāvuso, sattā ekattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā ābhassarā.
dn34:2.2.17_0: Santāvuso, sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhā.
dn34:2.2.19_0: Santāvuso, sattā asaññino appaṭisaṁvedino, seyyathāpi devā asaññasattā.
dn34:2.2.21_1: sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā.
dn34:2.2.23_0: Santāvuso, sattā sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā.
dn34:2.2.25_0: Santāvuso, sattā sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā.
dn34:2.2.27_0: Santāvuso, sattā sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagā.
dn34:2.2.32_8: ārakkhādhikaraṇaṁ daṇḍādānasatthādānakalahaviggahavivādatuvaṁtuvaṁpesuññamusāvādā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti.
dn34:2.2.39_0: ‘piyassa me manāpassa anatthaṁ acarī’ti āghātaṁ bandhati …pe…
dn34:2.2.42_0: ‘appiyassa me amanāpassa atthaṁ acarī’ti āghātaṁ bandhati …pe…
dn34:2.2.48_0: ‘anatthaṁ me acari, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti;
dn34:2.2.49_0: ‘anatthaṁ me carati, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti;
dn34:2.2.50_0: ‘anatthaṁ me carissati, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti;
dn34:2.2.53_0: anatthaṁ carissati, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti;
dn34:2.2.56_0: atthaṁ carissati, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti.
dn34:2.2.68_1: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.69_0: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.70_0: Pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.71_0: Sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.72_0: Sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā …pe… ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.73_0: Sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.74_0: Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.75_0: Sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.76_0: Sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.80_0: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa kāmasaññā niruddhā hoti,
dn34:2.2.81_0: dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā niruddhā honti,
dn34:2.2.82_0: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa pīti niruddhā hoti,
dn34:2.2.83_0: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa assāsapassāssā niruddhā honti,
dn34:2.2.88_0: saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca niruddhā honti.
dn34:2.2.90_0: Iti ime navuti dhammā bhūtā tacchā tathā avitathā anaññathā sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
dn34:2.3.1_0: Dasa dhammā bahukārā …pe… dasa dhammā sacchikātabbā.
dn34:2.3.4_3: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
dn34:2.3.5_0: Yaṁpāvuso, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
dn34:2.3.7_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu bahussuto …pe… diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
dn34:2.3.10_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto hoti kalyāṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
dn34:2.3.13_1: bhikkhu suvaco hoti sovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgato,
dn34:2.3.16_1: bhikkhu yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṁ uccāvacāni kiṅkaraṇīyāni tattha dakkho hoti analaso tatrupāyāya vīmaṁsāya samannāgato,
dn34:2.3.19_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu dhammakāmo hoti piyasamudāhāro abhidhamme abhivinaye uḷārapāmojjo.
dn34:2.3.25_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati …pe… kusalesu dhammesu.
dn34:2.3.31_1: bhikkhu paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato,
dn34:2.3.37_0: pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānāti uddhaṁ adho tiriyaṁ advayaṁ appamāṇaṁ.
dn34:2.3.46_0: viññāṇakasiṇameko sañjānāti uddhaṁ adho tiriyaṁ advayaṁ appamāṇaṁ.
dn34:2.3.69_0: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti.
dn34:2.3.71_1: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano,
dn34:2.3.76_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
dn34:2.3.77_0: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu chaḷaṅgasamannāgato hoti.
dn34:2.3.79_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu satārakkhena cetasā samannāgato hoti.
dn34:2.3.80_0: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu ekārakkho hoti.
dn34:2.3.83_0: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu caturāpasseno hoti.
dn34:2.3.85_2: sabbāni tāni nunnāni honti paṇunnāni cattāni vantāni muttāni pahīnāni paṭinissaṭṭhāni.
dn34:2.3.86_0: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu paṇunnapaccekasacco hoti.
dn34:2.3.88_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhuno kāmesanā pahīnā hoti, bhavesanā pahīnā hoti, brahmacariyesanā paṭippassaddhā.
dn34:2.3.89_0: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu samavayasaṭṭhesano hoti.
dn34:2.3.92_0: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu anāvilasaṅkappo hoti.
dn34:2.3.94_1: bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ
dn34:2.3.95_0: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro hoti.
dn34:2.3.97_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhuno rāgā cittaṁ vimuttaṁ hoti, dosā cittaṁ vimuttaṁ hoti, mohā cittaṁ vimuttaṁ hoti.
dn34:2.3.98_0: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu suvimuttacitto hoti.
dn34:2.3.100_1: bhikkhu ‘rāgo me pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo’ti pajānāti.
dn34:2.3.105_0: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu suvimuttapañño hoti.
dn34:2.3.114_0: Ye ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti.
dn34:2.3.124_0: Ye ca micchāvimuttipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti.
dn34:2.3.130_0: Iti ime satadhammā bhūtā tacchā tathā avitathā anaññathā sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā”ti.
dn34:2.3.132_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
